Login and logout¶

Login.¶

class account.views.auth.CustomAuthToken(**kwargs)¶

Login endpoint.

POST (body json)

@param: username:str

@param: password:str

Checking out login and password and setting user online.

METHOD: POST

URL: api-token-auth/

Input:

{   username: "wdw",
    password: "dwdw",
    socket_id: "c8b7ae71791b46339084945a94768c96"
}

Output:

{"non_field_errors":["Unable to log in with provided credentials."]}

{
     agent: "Mozilla/5.0..."
     sid: "1ba7263c206249648dd0bd5e7f92c556"
     token: "4473de9c59149d7f12682332e5bef50b5d515e8f"
     user: {id: 6, account: "0"...}
}

Logout.¶

class account.views.auth.LogoutView(**kwargs)¶

Logout.

METHOD: GET

URL: /logout

Output:

{'status': 0, 'message': 'Ok'}
